Posts.Content: Thank you ladies  It looks like Aveeno is the most popular choice I really appreciate your help good luck everyone xx
Posts.Title: Advice on which moisturiser to use during radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi scriptfan thank you so much! your an inspiration your words Hit home with me and I shall try the Aveeno andi shall  let you know how it goes. Looking forward to finishing the radiotherapy then think of a holiday which will be just the ticket. Take care PMA is the key  xxxx
Posts.Title: Advice on which moisturiser to use during radiotherapy

Posts.Content: Hi everyone I’m starting radiotherapy next week 20 sessions, and wondered if you could advise me on moisturiser to use I’m really confused as there are so many different views on what works best ? I was going towards an aloe Vera with vitamin E I suppose not one size fits all and it will be trial & error
Posts.Title: Advice on which moisturiser to use during radiotherapy
